C

Command - Class in <Unnamed>
 
Command() - Constructor for class Command
 
CommandFactory - Class in <Unnamed>
 
CommandFactory() - Constructor for class CommandFactory
 
Companion - Class in <Unnamed>
The companion extends NPC and has an additional field that is an Item gift for the user.
Companion(Item, String) - Constructor for class Companion
Creates a Companion NPC with a Item gift.
Companion(Scanner) - Constructor for class Companion
Creates a Companion NPC with a Scanner that reads from a dungeon file.
COMPANION_LEADER - Static variable in class GameState
Header String for player companion status when writing to a .sav file.
contents - Variable in class Room
Data structure used to store Item objects which in game are present in the Room.
CONTENTS_STARTER - Static variable in class Room
Header String for item contents when writing/reading from a file.
conversation - Variable in class NPC
Hashtable of NPC conversations
CURRENT_ROOM_LEADER - Static variable in class GameState
Header String for player position status when writing to a .sav file.
currentRoom - Variable in class NPC
Current Room of NPC
